name: Zamtek Industries
description:
Hello there!

Here at Zamtek Industries we are interested in the future of gravity manipulation technology. 

With our latest model ZTK Gravity-Manipulator we will change the future. Imagine the construction industry where the builders are able to hoist materials far exceeding their own weight. Imagine fire fighters being able to rescue trapped persons with ease. Well here at Zamtek Industries, that is what we are all about!

Come join our partner testing program and have the chance to help us change future!

We are interested in hearing from you, and always remember. 

The future will be today in no time!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Fire ZTK

Right Mouse Button - Attract Object

Scroll Wheel - Change Object Distance
